com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites.textures

Class TextureLoader.TexInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.utils.math.Tuple
      • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites.textures.TextureLoader.TexInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    TextureLoader

    public static class TextureLoader.TexInfo
extends Tuple
    TexInfo is a public, purely-organizational, class used by the Texture Loader to transfer texture info around methods. It holds a given texture's Texture Parts, RGB and Alpha TexTypes, its default TextureState, an array of its TextureStates, its width and height, and a boolean indicating if the texture uses its alpha channel.
    Author:
    jlreyes
